parameters: Oh, Aruru, are you kneading sap?
Phew, aren't you a good one?
Oh, Arl, how do you do?
Oh, yes, there was, wasn't there?
I feel strangely lonely with just my carbuncle.
I mean, if you're not attached to it, right?
Do you know anything about me?
In the trade of medicinal herbs and mushrooms.
I've been talking to a peddler fairy.
They've been talking about you, haven't they?
Wherever you are, there's always something to talk about, isn't there?
Just in case you're wondering, that fairy's name is...
I think he said something about Leah.
Yes, I picked out a human item for her.
Thank you!　I wish I didn't have that item on sale.
I might not have been able to explore the forest!
Curry and rice is very delicious.
（That fairy, she's like an event piece.
I used to bring home curry and rice for lunch.）
（That's what I call a curry girl...）
Oh, Aruru, are you kneading sap?
Phew, aren't you a good one?
Oh, Aruru, are you kneading sap?
I want to fight a witch.
I'll have it ready for you in a moment.
Phew, aren't you a good one?
I don't know if I've heard that before or not...
Witches are the descendants of witches, aren't they?
I heard that the witches know a lot about the Lost Forest.
My grandmother didn't give me any details.
I'm sorry I can't help you.
If you're in a forest where you're sure to get lost when you enter
There is a small forest that can be reached from the kitchen door.
If you try to go back to normal, you won't come back.
I don't know, it's not what I imagined...
Is it such a close, small forest?
I don't know what kind of image you have of the lost forest you're looking for, Aruru.
I'm told the land has been handed down to witches for generations.
So, Witch, you've been in those woods before, right?
Yeah, I go in there sometimes.
Foraging for medicinal herbs and mushrooms
Why doesn't the Witch get lost?
If we walk all the way north, we can get back.
If I try to go back to the south direction, I can't leave the forest forever.
Oh, it looks like a lost forest.
It's okay if you want to go out for a bit.
I'm gonna go check it out.
Be very careful with the pseudobunkuru.
It's a nasty demon that will attack you even if you stay put.
Then I won't be able to tell it's fake.
Stay on my shoulders, okay, Kaa?
I want to fight a witch.
Are you sure you want to do this?
I'm going to show you the difference in our abilities.
You're not quite there yet, Arle.
You don't have to be so sincere!
I don't want to be in pain.
I knew it was the Witch's cabin!
I saw some kind of witchy hut.
I just thought it was a perfect image.
I didn't mean it in a bad way.
（I'm kind of the same way, so...）
Hey Witch, did you notice anything strange around here?
Actually, I've been wondering about something.
I've been asking around about this place.
Well, you're always meddling, aren't you?
Why don't you just leave other people alone?。
I get so nervous when I see Aruru...
When I think about you, Aruru, my heart starts to ache...
I just want to make it mine and make a mess of it!
Oh, a toy with a voice would be wonderful!
The joy of subjugating a girl of your age...
I can't get enough of your sweet, mellow voice...!
Okay, well, I'll just... I'll just...
I'm using you as my test subject.
（I don't think so, Witch has a strange signal too!）
（No?　I mean, if I'm sleepwalking, maybe it's the usual?）
（And for now, I need to come to my senses!）
I never knew a witch could be so powerful...
Oh, Arle, how do you do?。
Why are you in my house?
Hey Witch, don't you remember what's been going on with you?
What do you mean, what happened?
When was the last time you saw me?
I went to borrow a book from the magic school and ran into him.
We had lunch together, didn't we?。
That's for sure. But you don't remember anything now...
（I'm scared, but I think I'll just ask.）
Let me ask you something. You're a...
Do you want to pick on me and make me cry?
Do you want to sexually tease me, or torture me, or...?
What is it?　All of a sudden.
Did you read a thin book somewhere and want to be fucked?
We will only be mixing medicines for the assignment.
I'm afraid I don't have any aphrodisiacs on hand.
Oh, no. It's not like I want to be treated. Ha-ha-ha...
（I know Witch has no intention of doing that.
It's not like I'm forcing you to do anything, so...。
（I don't know if I'd do it if I wasn't forced to.
So, to ask a question that would make such a fairy happy.
You didn't come all the way to my house, did you?
Here!　Where did you find this!
Aah!　You've got your eye on a good one!
It's a found object, but I'm going to leave this in my room.
My eyes get tired when I read...
Oh, my God! What are you doing?
Witch, maybe this is why she attacked me.。
I've been feeling a lot of pain.
I see. I'm going to use the machine that this doctor developed.
If you're saying you saw this same shape in the lab...
I'll have to take your word for it.。
Dr. Wells is probably missing, too, and...
The lab was supposed to be closed.
It's left unattended, unlocked and untouched.。
Machines that may have been taken out and modified by those bad people.。
It was great to be able to read without worrying about eye fatigue, but
It would have been dangerous to continue to use it when it's emitting an unidentified signal.。
By the way, where did you pick up this machine?
It was left on the back porch.。
I thought you picked it up from the woods!
On second thought, it's really addressed to me.
If you were planning to brainwash me into doing something...
I can't let you do that.。
Hey, you should come with me, Witch.。
Two is better than one, you know.。
I mean, it was a close call even now, but it was the two of us, so we made it.。
If we work together, I'm sure we can figure out where the doctor is!
That's right. I don't mind that kind of thing about you, Aruru.
I'm afraid I have to decline this time.。
If we work together, we'll just end up with two mummies.。
I'll move separately and support you, Arul.。
There are some things that only I can do.。
Okay, well, I'm a little disappointed, but I get it.。
Yes, Arle, do you know about sap?
Yeah!　I use it a lot for wands and stuff!
I'm on an assignment from my grandmother right now.
I'm working on a sap concoction.。
I'm sure you'll learn a lot, and I'd love to have you bring it to me.。
I'll turn you into an expensive sap.。
I don't remember witches being this strong.
Come on!　Arle, it's time for your punishment!
There's something I'd really like to try out on you, Arl!
Do you want to set up a warp point here?
It seems to have been destroyed by the electric shock.。
